fields.headline: The bankable Brit also-rans
fields.bodyText: Britain's top actress earners in 2001: Catherine Zeta Jones The Swansea-born actress increased her earnings from £2.42m in 2000 to £6.7m last year, with two hit movies: Traffic and America's Sweethearts Elizabeth Hurley She made £3.61m last year from cosmetic contracts, film parts and production deals Jane Seymour One of the queens of US TV drama, she earned £3.2m last year Julie Andrews Long associated with Mary Poppins and The Sound of Music, and currently in The Princess Diaries, she saw earnings reach £2.7m last year Rachel Weisz Her earning power boosted by the series of Mummy films, the Cambridge-educated actress made £2.5m in 2001 · From Benny Hill to Beverly Hills, a £20m journey for UK's best-paid actress
